data.lyric:
[ti:Out of Time]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:Dawn FM (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.52]Out of Time - The Weeknd
[00:01.69]Lyrics by：Abel Tesfaye/Daniel Lopatin/Tomoko Aran/Tetsuro Harada
[00:03.89]Composed by：Abel Tesfaye/Daniel Lopatin/Tomoko Aran/Tetsuro Harada
[00:05.85]
[00:21.68]The last few months I've been working on me baby
[00:25.43]
[00:26.78]There's so much trauma in my life
[00:30.44]
[00:31.95]I've been so cold to the ones who loved me baby
[00:36.15]
[00:37.10]I look back now and realize
[00:40.78]
[00:41.32]I remember when I held you
[00:46.08]
[00:47.77]You begged me with your drowning eyes to stay
[00:52.62]And I regret I didn't tell you
[00:56.64]Now I can't keep you from loving him
[00:59.32]You made up your mind
[01:00.89]
[01:01.66]Say I love you girl but I'm out of time
[01:06.21]
[01:06.88]Say I'm there for you but I'm out of time
[01:11.37]
[01:11.95]Say that I'll care for you but I'm out of time
[01:16.51]
[01:17.07]Said I'm too late to make you mine out of time
[01:21.69]
[01:22.56]If he mess up just a little
[01:24.62]
[01:25.19]Baby you know my line
[01:27.23]
[01:27.75]If you don't trust him a little
[01:30.27]Then come right back girl come right back
[01:32.97]Gimme one chance just a little
[01:35.55]Baby I'll treat you right
[01:37.85]And I'll love you like I should've loved you all the time
[01:42.95]I remember when I held you
[01:48.30]Held you baby
[01:49.81]You begged me with your drowning eyes to stay
[01:53.33]Never again baby
[01:54.69]And I regret I didn't tell you
[01:58.44]Now I can't keep you from loving him
[02:01.13]You made up your mind
[02:02.87]
[02:03.57]Say I love you girl but I'm out of time
[02:08.15]
[02:08.78]Say I'm there for you but I'm out of time
[02:13.30]
[02:13.88]Say that I'll care for you but I'm out of time
[02:18.43]
[02:19.03]Said I'm too late to make you mine out of time
[02:23.48]
[02:24.43]Oh singing out of time
[02:28.70]
[02:29.31]Said I had you to myself
[02:31.65]But I'm out of time
[02:33.96]
[02:34.53]Say that I'll care for you but I'm out of time
[02:39.12]
[02:39.87]But I'm too late to make you mine out of time
[02:44.14]
[02:47.79]Out of time
[02:49.45]
[02:53.00]Out of time
[02:54.59]
[03:00.91]Don't you dare touch that dial
[03:02.41]
[03:02.95]Because like the song says you are out of time
[03:06.13]
[03:06.73]You're almost there but don't panic
[03:09.24]There's still more music to come
[03:10.74]Before you're completely engulfed in the blissful embrace
[03:13.40]Of that little light you see in the distance
[03:15.62]
[03:16.28]Soon you'll be healed forgiven and refreshed
[03:18.86]Free from all trauma pain guilt and shame
[03:21.31]
[03:21.94]You may even forget your own name
[03:23.69]
[03:24.45]But before you dwell in that house forever
[03:26.87]Here's thirty minutes of easy listening to some slow tracks
[03:31.54]On 103.5 Dawn FM
data.trans:
[ti:Out of Time]
[ar:The Weeknd]
[al:Dawn FM (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.52]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.69]//
[00:03.89]//
[00:05.85]
[00:21.68]过去的几个月 我一直在努力 宝贝
[00:25.43]
[00:26.78]我的人生经历过许多创伤
[00:30.44]
[00:31.95]那些曾经深爱我的人 我一直冷漠以待 宝贝
[00:36.15]
[00:37.10]现在我回顾往昔 突然意识到
[00:40.78]
[00:41.32]我还记得我抱着你的时候
[00:46.08]
[00:47.77]你热泪盈眶 用那可怜的眼神恳求我留下
[00:52.62]我后悔当初我没有告诉你
[00:56.64]现在我无法阻止你用心爱他
[00:59.32]你已经下定决心
[01:00.89]
[01:01.66]说我爱你 女孩 但我已经没时间了
[01:06.21]
[01:06.88]说我会陪在你身边 但我已经没时间了
[01:11.37]
[01:11.95]说我会好好珍惜你 但我已经没时间了
[01:16.51]
[01:17.07]想让你成为我的专属 只可惜为时已晚 没有时间
[01:21.69]
[01:22.56]如果他犯下一点过错
[01:24.62]
[01:25.19]宝贝 你知道我的电话
[01:27.23]
[01:27.75]如果你一点都不信任他
[01:30.27]那就回到我身边吧 女孩 回到我身边
[01:32.97]请给我一次机会 仅此而已
[01:35.55]宝贝 我会好好待你
[01:37.85]我会好好爱你 就像我本该一直爱着你那样
[01:42.95]我还记得我抱着你的时候
[01:48.30]将你拥入怀中 宝贝
[01:49.81]你热泪盈眶 用那可怜的眼神恳求我留下
[01:53.33]不再重蹈覆辙 宝贝
[01:54.69]我后悔当初我没有告诉你
[01:58.44]现在我无法阻止你用心爱他
[02:01.13]你已经下定决心
[02:02.87]
[02:03.57]说我爱你 女孩 但我已经没时间了
[02:08.15]
[02:08.78]说我会陪在你身边 但我已经没时间了
[02:13.30]
[02:13.88]说我会好好珍惜你 但我已经没时间了
[02:18.43]
[02:19.03]想让你成为我的专属 只可惜为时已晚 没有时间
[02:23.48]
[02:24.43]引吭高歌 没有时间
[02:28.70]
[02:29.31]我曾说过 你只属于我
[02:31.65]但我已经没时间了
[02:33.96]
[02:34.53]说我会好好珍惜你 但我已经没时间了
[02:39.12]
[02:39.87]但我想让你成为我的专属 只可惜为时已晚 没有时间
[02:44.14]
[02:47.79]没有时间
[02:49.45]
[02:53.00]没有时间
[02:54.59]
[03:00.91]你竟敢碰一下拨号盘
[03:02.41]
[03:02.95]因为就像歌里唱的一样 你已经没时间了
[03:06.13]
[03:06.73]你即将取得成功 不要惊慌失措
[03:09.24]接下来还有更多的音乐
[03:10.74]在你完全沉浸在你看到远处
[03:13.40]那一丝微光所带来的幸福里以前
[03:15.62]
[03:16.28]不久以后 你会得到治愈 得到宽恕 终将焕然一新
[03:18.86]摆脱所有创伤 痛苦 内疚以及羞愧
[03:21.31]
[03:21.94]你甚至可能会忘记自己的名字
[03:23.69]
[03:24.45]但在你永远徜徉在那间房子里以前
[03:26.87]接下来是长达三十分钟的舒缓慢歌
[03:31.54]请调频至103.5 Dawn FM收听
